solution_line_template: First find the size of the second bell: {first_bell} pounds * {second_bell_multiplier} = <<{first_bell}*{second_bell_multiplier}={second_bell}>>{second_bell} pounds
Then find the size of the third bell: {second_bell} pounds * {third_bell_multiplier} = <<{second_bell}*{third_bell_multiplier}={third_bell}>>{third_bell} pounds

Then add the amount of bronze used for each bell to find the total: {second_bell} pounds + {third_bell} pounds + {first_bell} pounds = <<{second_bell}+{third_bell}+{first_bell}={total_bronze}>>{total_bronze} pounds
